sessions.description: Understanding how to upgrade Dashboard_May10 from browser-only storage to database storage for cross-device sync
Successfully retrieved dashboard-db connection details from Render
Understanding how database tables organize task information with columns for id, text, type, etc.

sessions.decision: Use existing tasks table structure instead of creating new one
sessions.description: Found existing tasks table with: id, title, description, status, user_id, due_date, created_at
Understanding how Dashboard tasks map to existing database columns (title, description, status, etc.)
Understanding how AI voice commands like 'start grocery list' get stored using description field as tags
Understanding what API endpoints do - GET, POST, PUT, DELETE operations
Better understanding of APIs using restaurant analogy - GET/POST/PUT/DELETE operations
Understanding why separate task_type column, clear status values, and optional fields are better design

notes: Learning log for tracking confidence ratings and progress
